summary: An Ordinance authorizing Puget Sound Traction, Light & Power Company, its successors and assigns, to occupy and use so much of Taylor Avenue as lies between Republican and Mercer Streets in the City of Seattle, until midnight on December 31, 1934, in consideration of said Company constructing and maintaining a reinforced concrete or steel viaduct on Taylor Avenue from Republican Street to Mercer Street, and authorizing such Company to construct such viaduct.
